name: Spear of Shojin
simpleDescription: Reduce damage taken from champions by a flat amount. Attack while near multiple enemy champions to increase this amount for a short time.

passives.name: Focused Will
passives.effects: Dealing ability damage with a non-innate ability grants a stack for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and up to once per cast instance per second and every second for damage over time abilities. For each stack, your non-basic damage dealt by non-items gain 3% increased damage, for a total increase of 12% at maximum stacks.
